entries.title: Major Features!
entries.text:
- Added the highly requested save and load system 
- Options can now be adjusted directly from the main menu 
- Slightly refined overall UI colors for better readability and style 
- Removed tooltips due to a UI-related issue (will be revisited in a future update)

entries.title: Small additions and fixes
entries.text:
- Added a fullscreen toggle in the pause menu 
- Added a resolution dropdown in the pause menu 
- Made the transition from main menu to game smoother

entries.title: Hotfix 3
entries.text:
- Changed the shop details UI to show what the shop sells instead of who the shop owner is 
- Improved the visuals for the shop details UI 
- Fixed the colours of butters sell UI

entries.title: Hotfix 2
entries.text:
- Fixed an where the info for perks would not display correctly 
- Fixed an a small typo issue in Margaine's shop UI

entries.title: Hotfix 1
entries.text: - Some items were left out in the inventory that were used for testing purposes. These items have now been removed

entries.title: Third release
entries.text:
- Added volume slider in pause menu 
- Added Drag Fertilising Perk 
- Added info for perks
- Fixed the box collider for one of the shops 
- Deselect items after 15 seconds of inactivity 
- Higher priced animals drops more fertiliser 
- Fixed a shop displaying the wrong name
- Various bug fixes and quality of life improvements

entries.title: Hotfix
entries.text: - Fixed an issue where shops would not restock properly after being purchased from

entries.title: Second release
entries.text:
- Added max stocks and restock mechanic
- New Craig spawn points 
- Shop names and opening hours can be checked by clicking on the shop 
- Added Infected Crops that can be used in a the new Composter to obtain Golden Fertilizer 
- Outlines around various interactive objects for better visibility 
- Back button added to various menus for easier navigation 
- Lofi toggle added to pause menu 
- Added a interaction range to the barrels 
- Various bug fixes and quality of life improvements
